Package it.nieels.unibs.pajc.h1v3.controller.network

Class NetworkClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.nieels.unibs.pajc.h1v3.controller.network.NetworkClient
  • public class NetworkClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a client capable of connecting and communicating with a specified server.
    Author:
    Nicol Stocchetti

      • NetworkClient

        public NetworkClient​(java.lang.String serverHost,
                     int port)
              throws java.net.ConnectException
        The main constructor, that allows to specify the IP and port for the server connection.
        Parameters:
        serverHost - the hosting server's IP or name, String.
        port - the port on which the host is providing service, int.
        Throws:
        java.net.ConnectException
